alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 24 at 4:42AM MST until January 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Variable visibility as low as one half mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine County, Hill County, Northern Blaine County, and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Highly variable visibility across short distances could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Frost deposition may create slippery spots on area roadways, especially bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Western and Central Chouteau County
